blog.name: blacktridenthq
blog.title: Alea iacta est.
blog.description:
This is a modern day pirates roleplay based in an AU world where pirates have always run rampant and royalty still exists in the six continents. After the royals put new laws into effect that would jail or execute all pirates, the pirates decided to take the law into their own hands. to get back at the royals, six pirate ships all owned by one fearless captain and his family has kidnapped the royal heirs and taken them to a private island where they can be stowed away, hidden.

Mobile Navigation


Next app acceptance: June 4th

summary: Marvel As Underrated Queen Songs
body:
Marvel As Underrated Queen Songs

(Except for Peter Q. And Thanos 👊😔👊)

Tony Stark: The Millionare Waltz

Peter Parker: Lazing on a Sunday Afternoon

Natasha Romanoff: Sweet Lady

Steve Rogers: Bring Back That Leroy Brown

Thor: In the Lap of The Gods

Pepper Potts: Lily of the Valey

Bucky: Misfire

Rhodey: Now I’m Here

Peter Q.: Fat Bottom Girls- Live in Paris

Drax: Innuendo

Thanos: Another one bites the dust

Mantis: Play the Game

Carol: Now I’m Here

Bruce: I’m in Love With My Car

Wanda: Brighton Rock

(These are just off the top of my head Jdjsks I’m obviously gonna make a pt.2)

summary: "Maybe you're not perfect, but you're willing to actually look at yourself and take some kind of accountability. That's a...
caption: “Maybe you’re not perfect, but you’re willing to actually look at yourself and take some kind of accountability. That’s a change. It might not mean that you can turn everything around, but I think there’s something incredibly hopeful about that.”

summary: Captain Marvel Actress Brie Larson Receives Backlash Over Instagram Tribute To Stan Lee
title: Captain Marvel Actress Brie Larson Receives Backlash Over Instagram Tribute To Stan Lee
body:
Captain Marvel Actress Brie Larson Receives Backlash Over Instagram Tribute To Stan Lee

Captain Marvel actress Brie Larson put out a tribute to the late, great Stan Lee, but quickly deleted the photo after she received fan backlash

In a now-deleted Instagram post, the Captain Marvel actress posted a photo of herself holding up what looks like some kind of mixed drink. She captioned the photo saying, “Thinking about Stan. What a legend. R.I.P.”

It seems that she may have felt the…

View On WordPress

summary: What "Disney Plus" brings on for its launch in late 2019...
title: What "Disney Plus" brings on for its launch in late 2019...
body:
What brings Disney on for its own streaming platform launch in late 2019 and it might be even cheaper than Netflix?

Image: Disney

With HBO, Amazon Studios, Hulu and Netflix like so many others streaming platforms on the online market, Disney is also now ready to bring on the game for their audience as Disney CEO Bob Iger confirms the new exclusive streaming service.

CEO Robert Iger has recently confirmed that Disney’s new service for streaming is renamed to Disney+ and will launch in late 2019. The company…

View On WordPress
